projects.title: Travel Log
projects.description: Log your trips and events on Travel Log! This is a full-stack web app with full CRUD functionality, done in a group of 3 within 5 days with REST APIs, managed workflow using Git and Github. Login info - Username: demo Password: demo

projects.title: Easy Peasy - Share Your Recipes
projects.description: A full-stack responsive web app built for a recipe-sharing foodie community with a clean, minimalist layout. Added user authentication and individual user pages to view, create, edit and delete owned recipes. Login info - Username: DessertMaster Password: 1111

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe with Kitty & Doggo
projects.description: A Kitty-VS-Doggo interactive game made with love for my kitty Mochi. You can upload your pet's picture to play around! Additional functionalities includes sound effect control, CSS animation and a picture-uploading function.
